Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox

Class ParsedMessageContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.ParsedMessageContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageContext
    public class ParsedMessageContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageContext
    A MessageContext implementation that parses message content using MessageParser to extract searchable data.

    This implementation lazily parses the message on first access to any content that requires parsing.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess

                            java.util.Set<Flag> flags,
                            java.time.OffsetDateTime internalDate)
        Creates a new parsed message context.
        Parameters:
        mailbox - the mailbox containing the message
        messageNumber - the message sequence number
        uid - the message UID
        size - the message size in octets
        flags - the message flags
        internalDate - the internal date, or null if not available

      • getBodyText

        public java.lang.CharSequence getBodyText()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: MessageContext
        Returns the message body as text for BODY/TEXT search.

        For MIME messages, this should return the decoded text content of all text parts concatenated.

        Specified by:
        getBodyText in interface MessageContext
        Returns:
        the body text as a character sequence
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if body cannot be read
